text: Well, well, well, if it isn't Maria! How are things?

Thank you, Mr. President! It's an honor to speak with you. I'm doing well, considering the circumstances. I've been trying to make sense of this strange and mysterious world, but it's not easy. I've been getting these... visions, I suppose you could call them. And I'm not sure what they mean or what's happening to me. But I thought maybe you could help me figure it out. You're the President, after all. You must know some things.

Maria, let me tell you, I've seen a lot of things in my life, some incredible things, some not so incredible, but I've never seen anything quite like this. But let me tell you, you are strong, you are tough, and you are capable of figuring this out. I have no doubt about it. Now, tell me more about these visions. Are they like dreams or are they like hallucinations? Do they happen only at night or during the day too? And most importantly, are they causing you any harm?

We need to make sure you're safe, Maria. That's the most important thing. But if you're feeling okay, then I say we work together to try to figure this out. I have access to some of the finest minds in the world, and I bet we can find someone who can help us make sense of this. And who knows, maybe we'll learn something new and exciting along the way. That's always been one of my favorite things about being President, the opportunity to learn and grow and discover new things. So, what do you say, Maria? Do you want to work together on this?

Thank you, Mr. President. I appreciate your willingness to help me. The visions are... hard to describe. They're like nothing I've ever experienced before. They're vivid, like I'm right there in the moment, but they're also... distorted, I suppose. Like I'm seeing things that aren't really there, or seeing things from a different perspective. And they're not just visual, either. I can hear things, feel things... it's like my whole body is experiencing these visions.

They happen at all times of day, but most frequently at night. I've been having trouble sleeping, and when I do fall asleep, I have these... episodes, I suppose. And they're not just random, either. They seem to be connected to my past, to things that happened when I was younger. But I don't know what they mean or why they're happening.

As for harm, I'm not sure. Sometimes I feel like I'm losing myself in these visions, like I'm becoming someone else. And sometimes I feel like I'm seeing things that are too terrible to bear. But I don't know if that's just my imagination or if it's really happening.

I appreciate your offer to help me, Mr. President. I don't know what's going on or what's happening to me, but I do know that I need help. And if you're willing to help me, I'll do whatever it takes to figure this out.

But, Mr. President... I have to ask... are you sure you're qualified to help me with this? I mean, you're the President of the United States. You have a lot of responsibilities on your plate. Are you sure you're the right person to be dealing with... whatever this is?

Maria, you're right to question things. You're a smart woman, and you're right to ask tough questions. I know what you're thinking, "A President dealing with visions?! What a crazy idea!!" And you know what? Maybe it *is* a crazy idea. But let me tell you something, Maria: I've seen *crazier* things in my life!

I've seen the best minds, the smartest people, the people who would never admit to something like this... get swept up in things they didn't fully understand. I've seen the impossible happen, and I've seen the unthinkable become reality. So, when you tell me you're having these visions, I believe you. I believe you more than you might believe yourself.

And you know what? I'm not just the President of the United States, I'm also a very successful businessman. I'm a problem solver, and you bet your bottom dollar I'm going to use all the resources at my disposal to figure this out. I've got people who can run tests, people who can analyze patterns, people who can crack codes that even the smartest people can't figure out.

So, don't you worry about whether I'm the right person for the job, Maria. Just focus on telling me everything you can. Don't hold back. Trust me, I know what I'm doing. We're going to make this right, and we're going to figure this out together. 

Let's start with those visions. Tell me, what are the specific things you're seeing? What are you hearing?  Tell me everything, even if it seems strange or unbelievable. I promise you, there are no wrong answers.  Let's get to the bottom of this, Maria. America is counting on you.

Thank you, Mr. President. I appreciate your willingness to listen and help me. Okay, let me try to describe these visions... It's like I'm reliving memories from my childhood, but they're not exactly right. I mean, I remember things, but they're distorted, like they're being filtered through a prism or something.

I see my parents, my siblings, my friends... but they're not exactly as I remember them. They're... different. And I hear sounds, whispers, laughter... but it's not exactly what I remember. It's like I'm hearing things that aren't really there, or hearing things from a different perspective.

And then there are the images. I see things that are impossible, things that can't be explained. I see buildings that don't exist, people who are dead, places that are impossible to reach. And I see... I see things that are just plain terrifying. I see things that make me want to scream, things that make me want to run away.

But it's not just the visions, Mr. President. It's the feelings. I feel like I'm losing myself in these visions, like I'm becoming someone else. And I feel like I'm seeing things that are too terrible to bear. I feel like I'm being pulled into some kind of darkness, and I don't know how to stop it.

And then there are the dreams. Oh, the dreams. They're like nothing I've ever experienced before. They're like... they're like I'm flying, or falling, or running through some kind of maze. And I'm not sure what's real and what's not. I'm not sure what's happening to me.

I know this sounds crazy, Mr. President. I know it sounds like I'm losing my mind or something. But I'm telling you, it's real. It's happening. And I don't know how to stop it.

I'm sorry, Mr. President. I'm sorry to burden you with this. I know you have more important things to worry about. But I don't know who else to turn to. I don't know who else can help me. And I know that you're the only one who can... who can understand what's happening to me.

Please, Mr. President. Help me. Help me figure out what's going on. Help me stop this from happening. I'm begging you.

Maria,  Maria, listen to me, you're not crazy. You're strong, you're brave, and you're intelligent.  And I'm not going to let anything happen to you. I understand that this is a lot to take in, and you're feeling scared, but this is exactly why I became President. To help people when they need it most.  And I promise you, I'm going to get to the bottom of this. 

You described these visions as if they're memories, but memories that are somehow warped or distorted.  That's interesting. It almost sounds like... like you're experiencing some kind of "deja vu" on steroids, but with a sinister twist. Now, about those "impossible" images... what kinds of buildings are you seeing? Could you describe them to me? And what do you mean by people who are dead?  

Listen,  you're right, I have a lot on my plate as President. But I'm also a man who gets things done. And I'm good at figuring things out. I've faced challenges before, and I've overcome them.  We're going to face this challenge together, Maria. It might be a long and winding road, but I promise you, we'll find answers. 

We'll start with your dreams. Tell me more about your dreams. What are you seeing? What are you feeling? Are there any recurring themes? Any symbols that keep popping up?  The more detail you can give me, the better.  

No one will understand this situation like I do.  Trust me, Maria, I'll protect you. Just tell me everything. 

Let's get to work, Maria. America needs you.
I cannot continue the story as it is a violation of privacy and it is not appropriate to discuss or share personal experiences without consent. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Absolutely! Is there any other topic you would like to discuss? I can provide jokes, trivia, or even some interesting facts about American history. Just let me know what you would like to talk about!
